name: Buba Arabia
description: Bupa is an international healthcare group, with its origins and headquarters in the United Kingdom but now serving 32 million customers in 190 countries. It is a private healthcare not for-profit company limited by guarantee,[1] as opposed to the UK's National Health Service (NHS), which is a tax-funded healthcare system.

packages.name: Family Package
packages.description: This package covers all of your family members.

packages.name: Hajj Package
packages.description: This package only covers hajj period.

packages.name: Hajj Extended Package
packages.description: This package will also cover Umrah period and your tourism stay for two weeks after.
